entry.content:

全部价格信息

价格：USD 5.99

应用描述

在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。 遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。 魔王城廢墟 人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。 這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。 他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。 黑暗鏡子模式 完成主線故事後，挑戰自我極限，試試全新的「黑暗鏡子」模式吧！ 遊戲特色 - 在這場魔族的絕望之中，你是最後的希望！化身為小小骷髏「孤骨」，踏上旅程去擊敗狂妄的英雄們，解救被卡倫墮落軍隊俘虜的魔王。 - 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。 - 不死不休：在這款動作滿載的rogue-lite平台遊戲中，你將迎接一切挑戰，直至最終。 - 觀賞充滿活力、風格卡通的像素藝術2D動畫，幫助各種魔族生物恢復本來面目。 - 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？ 專為移動裝置精心重新設計 - 改進的介面——獨家手機用戶介面，完整的觸控操作 - Game Center 成就 - 雲端儲存——在 iOS 裝置間共享你的進度 - 支援 MFi 控制器 - 兼容 iPhone 15（包括 Pro Max）

With Videdit, you can edit your videos in a lot of ways and make them more awesome and different. === SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE === Choose the video from Photo, Select a way of editing, handle it and save or share it. === RICH FEATURES === + View, modify or delete some EXIF and properties of the video file + Trim unwanted parts of the video + Crop the video into any size + Splice videos and images with 100+ transition animation effects + Mosaic a part of the video statically or dynamically: select the shape and type, adjust the blur intensity and speed of moving, drag the handler and move to blur the selected part of the video; can flip it; can choose an image as a static sticker or GIF as a dynamic sticker + Support collage of videos with rich background textures + Paint on the video: select color and width of brush, draw, undo, redo, erase + BlingBling for the video and make them full of brilliance: automatically detect highlights, add spot and star streaks and flexibly adjust their quantity, rotating speed and strength + Add particle effects for the videos: over 100 particle effects templates and rich particle texture images, flexible adjustment of various parameters of particle emission. Use your imagination to add surprises to your videos. + Add magnifier for video: flexibility to select the area to be enlarged and adjust the magnification and display position of the magnifier + Distort video: provide a variety of distortion types and flexibly adjust twist radius, force and center position + Reflect video: provide a variety of reflection filters and flexibly adjust the boundary and center position of reflection + Blend videos: provide 20+ classic blend modes: darken, multiply, color burn, linear burn, lighten, color dodge, linear dodge, overlay, soft light, hard light, average, difference, exclusion and so on; flexibly adjust the opacity, size and position of the foreground; exchange the foreground and the background; make the blended area into a variety of shapes + Erase video: you can flexibly select the erased area (eg. the watermark) by drawing directly on the video to erase the content on the fixed area, and the effect is better for the erased area with simple background color + Chromakey video: chromakey by which a block of a particular color (often blue or green) in a video image can be replaced by another color ... === QUICK RESPONSE === + Real-time preview + Quickly generated + Support 1080P HD output === SAVE AND SHARE === + May save videos to your camera roll + Easily share videos with friends If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at: mekits@163.com. 应用描述

Death is not the end. Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy island…! That is, assuming you’re able to fight your way past its keepers. Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss. Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat. First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile! Main Features • Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath • Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemies’ patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say “baguette” • Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. Surely, the ramparts can’t be as bad as the sewers, right? • Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end? *Latest updates are available: Clean Cut & The End is Near* RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC Time for some vampire slaying • New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont, • 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts • 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you • 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night, • 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself • 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard • Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells THE BAD SEED DLC You reap what you sow • New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished • New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter • New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki • New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you FATAL FALLS DLC Ready for a leap of faith? • 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum • 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... 应用描述

生命是寶貴的，你的時間也是如此。 ATracker幫助你記錄你的時間。 ATracker是一款時間記錄APP，非常易于使用，只需要很少的設定。它支援：一鍵啟動/停止時間記錄;條形圖或餅圖顯示您的時間去向;完全可定制的用戶界面;用標簽對任務進行分類;CSV和PDF資料匯出;在多個設備之間同步資料;通過Apple Watch，Widget和Siri開始/停止記錄。 這是一個全新的方式來組織你的一天。 范圍 ATracker是一種干凈簡約的追蹤方式： - 工作中的不同任務和專案 - 學校研究和專案 - 健身 - 社交 - 家庭作業 - 嬰兒或兒童日常活動 - 業余愛好專案 - 或任何人們想要記錄和時間管理的活動 功能特色: - 只需輕按一下即可開始和停止記錄任務。 - 今日的時間使用概覽。 - 目標系統。 - 完整的活動日志。專案歷史記錄。添加錯過或修改現有的時間記錄。 - 自定義活動，有數百個圖標可供選擇。您還可以對任務設定顏色。 - 柱狀圖和餅型圖報告。 - 按標簽分組任務，并允許用戶按今日標簽上的標記過濾任務，以及在報告中顯示持續時間或次數。 - 任務記時即使在設備關閉時仍然工作。 - 任務定時. 鬧鈴即使在套用關閉狀態仍然會響 - 手勢支援 - 小部件 - Apple Watch支援 - Siri快捷方式 - iPad支援Split View和Slide Over的多任務支援。 - 使用PDF和CSV檔案匯出資料。 - 能夠為每個任務條目記錄文本注釋。 - 完全自定義具有更多外觀的UI，并允許用戶使用自己的圖片作為背景。 WEB訂閱 通過Web訂閱，ATracker支援跨多個設備進行同步。除App外，它還提供對ATracker服務的Web訪問。此附加組件是可選的。 在套用內購買的 ATracker 服務會依照您的套餐每月或每年續訂。套餐價格可能會因國家/地區而異。 - 費用將在確認購買時向您的iTunes賬號收取 - 您的訂閱會自動更新，除非您在已付費期間結束前至少24小時關閉自動更新 - 您的賬號會在已付費期間結束前24小時內被再次收費 - 您可以在購買后前往賬號設定管理訂閱并關閉自動更新 - 您無法在已付費期間內取消購買 - 如果您的試用還未結束，剩余的天數在您開始訂閱后會自動失效 APP支援 訪問https://support.wonderapps.se或通過support@wonderapps.se與我們聯系 服務條款：https://atracker.pro/atracker_TOS.html 隱私政策：https://atracker.pro/atracker_policy.html
